roleset.name: come about as a result of some other action

example.name: unaccusative
example.text: ESB directors warmly accepted, but a whirlwind bidding match ensued.

example.name: with cause
example.text: Much hilarity ensued from John's mistaking Mary's bedroom for his own.
example.arg: from John's mistaking Mary's bedroom for his own

predicate.note: Frames file for 'ensue' based on sentences in financial subcorpus andautomatic expansion via verbnet.
